About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

My Journey as a Developer

What started as a suggestion from a friend and looking for potential career changes has turned into a passion. I enrolled in Epicodus in January of 2021 and completed the program with a Certification in Web & Mobile Development in May. Through Epicodus I learned coding best practices and most importantly, the ability to teach myself new concepts and languages/libraries. I discovered ways to overcome feelings of inadequacy and finding immense joy in tackling and overcoming difficult problems. I was employed as an intern/temp at VALIDATE immediately following graduation from Epicodus and am currently looking for full time employment as a developer while bartending at the country club by my house and continuing my learning with programming by taking courses on Udemy and making applications

Udemy Certifications

Modern HTML & CSS

This course covers all modern HTML & CSS best practices including Flexbox, Grid, and Sass

The Complete JavaScript Course

This course covers everything from JS fundamentals to working with APIs and Data Structures/Algorithms

Microsoft SQL

This class covers all the fundamentals of querying databases with SQL using Microsoft SQL Server (I have experience use MySql from Epicodus)

AWS Amplify w/ React & GraphQL

This course covers using AWS Amplify with DynamoDB and GraphQL to create custom APIs and Databases with an example using a React Blog with full CRUD functionality
